location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident, Bushire, informs Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], that the Teinmouth[Teignmouth] leaves today carrying Colonel Harcourt, who has a packet for Europe from the Governor General [Richard Wellesley]. Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun shares the news that the Governor of Romia has refused to pay the annual tribute to the Persian King [Fat'h Ali Shah Qajar] and that a cavalry of five thousand has been sent against him.
